title: Another man waiting hours to get fuel in queue dies
body_lines: A 43-year old man, who was waiting to get diesel for his vehicle at a fuel station in Tawalama, Galle, was found dead inside the vehicle this morning.
Police said  the deceased has been identified as a resident of Baduwatta in Thawalama.
He had been waiting in the queue to get diesel for his lorry since early this morning.
However, he was found dead in the driver’s seat after waiting in line for hours.(DSB)
